identity.name: ResumeAI
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Paper-like realism) with Dark Mode option for Dashboard

headings.usage: Landing page headlines, Dashboard section titles

mono.usage: ATS scores, JSON data, Code snippets

primary.name: International Klein Blue

buttons.primary: bg-[#002FA7] text-white hover:bg-[#002FA7]/90 shadow-sm font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#0F172A] border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ai_action: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#002FA7] to-[#FF4F00] text-white hover:opacity-90 shadow-md

landing_page.structure: Asymmetrical grid with large typography and overlapping elements. Use 'Lenis' for smooth scrolling.
landing_page.hero_section: Split screen or Centered with 3D/Abstract background. Headline > 64px.

dashboard.structure: Sidebar navigation + Main Content Area. Cards for 'Saved Resumes', 'Subscription', 'Analytics'.

resume_builder.structure: Left: Form Input (Accordion/Steps). Right: Live PDF Preview (Sticky).
resume_builder.mobile: Tabs to switch between Edit and Preview.

hero_bg.alt: Professional workspace with focus and clarity

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent size (w-5 h-5).

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
motion.stagger_children: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-[#002FA7] on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text. Import them from Google Fonts.
Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page features section.
Use the defined color palette strictly. Do not use default Tailwind blue.
For the Resume Builder, ensure the 'Live Preview' is sticky on desktop.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
Implement a 'Dark Mode' toggle in the dashboard, but keep the default as Light Mode.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-12, p-24).
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate 900 (#0F172A).
Add micro-interactions to every button and card.
